long_description: Sporting an snug harness and load-stabilizing design, the Arc'teryx Chilcotin 12 Hydration Pack makes it easy to stay hydrated and haul your gear in comfort on your adventures in the great outdoors. 2-liter SOURCE hydration reservoir with Widepac(TM) closure resists mold and is easy to clean; dedicated reservoir compartment ensures easy access. Comfortable harness with ventilated shoulder straps and back panel wraps snugly around your torso, keeping the load centered and snug against your back. Main compartment features top and panel entries for easy access; front pocket, zippered top pocket and 2 zippered hipbelt pockets organize small essentials. The Arc'teryx Chilcotin 12 Hydration Pack features external compression straps, ice-axe loop and reflective accents.
short_description: Sporting an snug harness and load-stabilizing design, the Arc'teryx Chilcotin 12 Hydration Pack makes it easy to stay hydrated and haul your gear in comfort on your adventures in the great outdoors.
